attributes.action: Distance Learning Colleges must not provide students with fake diplomas and should be accredited
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some distance learning colleges in the UK are leaving students with worthless diplomas, and some are able to get their money back.  There should be an specialist body to police distance learning colleges. If a diploma state that all employers accept it then it should be true. It should not be misleading to students.
